document.full_text: yemeni tribesmen said they wrested a military compound from elite troops loyal to president ali abdullah saleh outside the capital sanaa on friday as fighting spread, threatening to tip the country into civil war.
document.title: yemen on brink of civil war as clashes spread
lines_and_colors: yemeni tribesmen said they wrested a military compound from elite troops loyal to president ali abdullah saleh outside the capital sanaa on friday as fighting spread, threatening to tip the country into civil war.
